Moment Timezone Playground

Result:

#Formatting

Examples

Date

Example Output
YYYY-MM-DD 2014-01-01
dddd, MMMM Do YYYY Friday, May 16th 2014
dddd [the] Do [of] MMMM Friday the 16th of May

Time

Example Output
hh:mm a 12:30 pm

Used by Moment.js and date-fns/format. Similar to Java SimpleDateFormat.

Date

Symbol Example Area
d 0..6 Weekday
dd Su
ddd Sun
dddd Sunday
YY 13 Year
YYYY 2013
M 1..12 (Jan is 1) Month
Mo 1st..12th
MM 01..12 (Jan is 1)
MMM Jan
MMMM January
Q 1..4 Quarter
Qo 1st..4th
D 1..31 Day
Do 1st..31st
DD 01..31
DDD 1..365 Day of year
DDDo 1st..365th
DDDD 001..365
w 1..53 Week of year
wo 1st..53rd
ww 01..53

Time

Symbol Example Area
H 0..23 24h hour
HH 00..23
h 1..12 12h hour
hh 01..12
m 0..59 Minutes
mm 00..59
s 0..59 Seconds
ss 00..59
a am AM/PM
A AM
Z +07:00 Timezone offset
ZZ +0730
S 0..9 Deciseconds
SS 00..99 Centiseconds
SSS 000..999 Milliseconds
X Unix timestamp
x Millisecond Unix timestamp

Presets

Example Output
LT 8:30 PM
LTS 8:30:25 PM
LL August 2 1985
ll Aug 2 1985
LLL August 2 1985 08:30 PM
lll Aug 2 1985 08:30 PM
LLLL Thursday, August 2 1985 08:30 PM
llll Thu, Aug 2 1985 08:30 PM
